description: Uses [yfinance](https://pypi.org/project/yfinance/) (unofficial package) to access financial data and market information from Yahoo! Finance.

inputs.name: symbol
inputs.info: The stock symbol to retrieve data for (e.g., AAPL, GOOG).

inputs.name: method
inputs.info: The type of data to retrieve.

inputs.name: num_news
inputs.info: The number of news articles to retrieve (only applicable for get_news).
